author: Dave Broom
description: Just as it says on the tin â€“ a smoky malt and cola. This simple but delicious drink perhaps doesn't need bitters or even a twist but it's better with these subtle embellishments.
name: Smoky Cokey
recipeIngredient: 105 ml Cola (e.g. Coca Cola or Pepsi Cola)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass and briefly stir
